answerText: Emperor of China [or Chinese Emperor or Huangdi; prompt on anything mentioning Chinese rulers][10] Jia Yunchuan is the cousin to this boy who is tricked to believe that he his marrying his true love Lin Daiyu but instead marries Xue Baochai. This protagonist's name is a play on words for "Fake Precious Jade."
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 3 | 21 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Jia Yunchuan serves as a consort to a person with this office in one work and another person with this office pardons Song Jiang's bandits in Water Margin. For 10 points each: [10] Name this position held by the person who sent Tang Seng on the title venture in Journey to the West, Taizong, and by a family that lost power at the beginning of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, the Han.
